hero_image.alt: A boy doing block coding on his tablet computer

copy.punchline: Get your kid future ready, TODAY.
copy.subtext: Online coding classes for kids 6-14 years
copy.text: Activity based curriculum designed to give your kid the Coding, Maths, and Logical skills to do well in life. To know more, book and experience a live, hands on class.

sections.name: Why Coding
sections.title: Why should your kid learn to code?
sections.subtitle: Coding is a 21st century superpower. It gives your kid an edge in virtually every modern industry, and sets them up for a lifetime of success.

image.alt: A boy playing with his toy car

cards.title: Boosts Creativity
cards.description: Coding expands the canvas of a kid's imagination. It also enables them to create powerful animations, games & apps.

image.alt: A depiction of teacher explaining theory

cards.title: Academic Excellence
cards.description: Coding is "Theory in Action". It helps your kid understand and apply the Maths & Science concepts taught in schools, in a fun way.

image.alt: A picture depicting bright future for software professional

cards.title: Bright Future
cards.description: Coding not only opens the doors to the top colleges & jobs, but it also helps your child develop an entrepreneurial mindset.

sections.name: JrInLab nurtures
sections.title: JrInLab, Nurturing the creators of tomorrow

cards.title: We're parents, too
cards.description: Before anything else, we're parents first. We take extra care in designing the right age appropriate curriculum for our kids. We just happened to be alumni of IITs, NTU, Singapore

image.alt: A mother interacting with her kid

cards.title: Focus on Experiential Learning
cards.description: *"I hear, and I forget. I see, and I remember. I do, and I understand."* That is why our curriculum is heavily activity based. Your kid will learn the coding concepts by doing hands-on projects. No scope for boring lectures.

image.alt: Depiction of kids playing with each other

cards.title: Passionate Educators
cards.description: We love teaching, so much so that our *founders* themselves are active educators here. The same passion for quality education is shared equally by everyone else in the team.

cards.title: Full-time Employees
cards.description: All of our educators are full-time employees of the company. We believe that teaching kids needs a full-time focus, and part-timers can not do justice with the demands of this role.

sections.name: famous quotes
sections.title: Need more convincing?
sections.subtitle: Hear what the experts have said

quotes.text: I taught myself how to program computers when I was a kid, bought my first computer when I was 10, and sold my first commercial program when I was 12.
I think it's fair to say that computers have become the most empowering tool we have ever created. They're tools of communication, they're tools of creativity, and they can be shaped by their user.
Everybody should learn to program a computer, because it teaches you how to think.

sections.name: testimonials
sections.title: Our students and parents love us

testimonials.text: Kudos to Mr. Rajeev and Mr. Vivek for always being supportive to any of my queries or requests. I have invited my friends in the UAE to also enroll online and they did and is liking it. My child gained new friends doing the same interest. I would recommend to any parent, new or old, to enroll in JrinLab for they know how to train the child to be FUTURE READY!

My daughter Nidhishree enjoys learning coding from JrinLab...The teacher is very friendly, down to earth and is teaching with lot of passion, dedication and commitment, which  has made my daughter learn coding with enjoyment.....we see lot of improvements in her confidence level in coding.

The course was a great exposure for Tanish, he learnt something new. Slowly he will develop interest in this. I would like to thank Syamala mam, for her excellent cooperation, Tanish is usually very uncomfortable with online learning specially with turning on the camera. But mam was really very cooperative, dealt with him very nicely.

My kid has taken the scratch course, the teacher is excellent, very patient with students, give them a chance to express their ideas and discuss it, listen carefully to their proposals. My kid was never bored, as she was all the time practicing on the software itself and not only taking theoric classes.

My son is 10 years old. He enjoyed the coding classes by JrinLab. Teacher took special efforts to make him understand the concepts in a playful manner. It is enjoyable learning at the comfort of home. I strongly recommended these classes.

sections.name: bottom cta
sections.title: Ready to invest in your child's tomorrow?
sections.description: Take that first step by scheduling a free class with us. We guarantee that like all of our students, your kid too will be hooked.
